extendedInfo.description: Love horse racing and need a cool, efficient way to stay on top of things?Want to get the latest news & videos about horse racing?Following a horse race, be it the Kentucky Derby or the Royal Ascot?Riversip Horse Racing News is the answer!Powered by the highly-acclaimed Riversip engine, it captures the very best of horse racing content online - and brings it to you at the simplest possible manner.This app's main goal is simple: Help you catch up on horse racing news in minimal time and on your own schedule.Whenever you open Horse Racing News, it shows you what are the biggest news items that you should know about â in the time frame of your choice. The idea is to adapt the endless flow of news to your own pace, making it easy for you to stay on top of the horse racing news items that really matter to you. In less than a minute, you can be on top of the latest âmust-knowâ items: Horse Racing News is the app where you stop by to have a quick glimpse at the most important horse racing stories of the day, the week, or the hour. So, what exactly do you get in Horse Racing News? * No setup or learning time required. Fire the app for the first time â and immediately see what are the current âmust-knowâ news in the horse racing world.* Catch up on your own schedule: You can choose your own time-frame in one tap, so you'll be up-to-date no matter how often you're checking things out. * Videos curated from leading horse racing sources* Check out only the headlines â or go deeper: You can check out any news item's coverage from the many sources which covered it. Seeing how different publications cover the same event from different angles was never so easy !* See what people you follow on Twitter had to say about any given story and have their tweets affect which stories you see first, giving you a socially-personalized news summary * No need to set up your sources and start looking for feeds! Horse Racing News automatically picks the most relevant article for any real-world event and shows it to you â and it also learns what sources you prefer as you use the app, and shows coverage from them to you when it's available. * Notifications about notable events are sent to you as they occur! Never lose a key update again. (and if you prefer not to bothered, you can turn them off :) )* Choose your favorite topics so you can easily stay on top of the things in the topics that matter to you. If there's a specific race, horse, jockey, country (e.g. - UK horse racing) or anything else you'd like to follow, this is the easiest, most efficient way to do so!The app features horse racing content from leading blogs & websites, including ESPN, BBC Sport, BloodHorse.com and many more!From user reviews of other Riversip-powered apps:"Perfect news app" - Bernhard (5 stars)"Wow. One of the best news apps out there!" - Ferdy (5 stars)"Excellent! I really like this!" (5 stars)Follow and chat with us at: http://twitter.com/riversip Use of the Riversip Application is governed by the Riversip Terms of Use (http://www.riversip.com/terms).
